title: SAP ETD
descriptionMarkdown: The SAP ETD data connector enables ingestion of security alerts from ETD into Sentinel, supporting cross-correlation, alerting, and threat hunting.

sampleQueries.query:
ETDAlerts_CL
            | where Message has "TokenIssuedEvent"
            | extend MessageDetail = tostring(parse_json(tostring(Message.data)).message)
            | project UpdatedOn, UserName, IPAddress = tostring(Message.ip), MessageDetail

dataTypes.name: ETDAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ETDAlerts_CL
            | summarize Time = max(CreationTimestamp)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ETDAlerts_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(CreationTimestamp)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This connector uses Azure Functions to connect to SAP ETD alerts into Microsoft Sentinel. This might result in additional data ingestion costs. Check the [Azure Functions pricing page](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/functions/) for details.

**Step 1 - Create a an Azure Key Vault**

 Refer to the [Azure Key Vault quickstart guide](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/key-vault/general/quick-create-portal) for details. This key vault will hold a client secret required to access the ETD API.

**Step 2 - Configuration steps for the SAP ETD API**

Follow the steps provided by SAP [see obtain client credentials for SAP ETD](https://<insert-link-here>). 

1. Take a note of the **url** (Audit Retrieval API URL), **uaa.url** (User Account and Authentication Server url) and the associated **uaa.clientid**.
2. Add the **uaa.clientsecret** as a secret in the Key Vault created in Step 1 and take note of the **name** of the secret.

**Step 3 - Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Template**

1. Click the **Deploy to Azure** button below. 

	[![Deploy To Azure](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://aka.ms/sentinel-sapetd-azuredeploy)
2. Enter the values collected in steps 1 and 2 as parameters in the ARM template. Populate Key Vault name, name of the Key Vault secret, Audit Retrieval API URL, UAA Server URL, clientid.
3. Click **Purchase** to deploy.
